channel.title: CAcert NEWS Blog
channel.description: CAcert NEWS and up coming events.

item.title: Testcampaign 1260 and children
item.description:
This is the branch to test bug-1260 and its children.
Merged in children are bug-1442. Additional changes: 2018-12-16: More changes from bug-1305 (cap forms): CAcert address and fingerprint format 2018-12-12: More changes from bug-1305 (cap forms) 2018-12-01: Once more cherry-picked cap form changes from bug-1305 2018-11-27: Cherry-picked bug-1305 (the cap/coap-forms only)
